    • isField

      public boolean isField(int row, int col)
      Returns true if the index of row and column is within the board else it returns false
      Parameters:
      row - is the row
      col - is the column
      Returns:
      true or false depending on row and column index

    • isField

      public boolean isField(int idx)
      Checks whether the index given is valid meaning between and including 0 and 59
      Parameters:
      idx - is index
      Returns:
      true or false depending on index

    • drawHorizontalLine

      public boolean drawHorizontalLine(int row, int col)
      Draws a horizontal line if the field is valid and empty
      Parameters:
      row - is index of row
      col - is index of column
      Returns:
      true or false depending on whether horizontal line is drawn

    • drawVerticalLine

      public boolean drawVerticalLine(int row, int col)
      Draws a vertical line if the field is valid and empty
      Parameters:

      col - is index of column
      Returns:
      true or false depending on whether vertical line is drawn

    • setField

      public void setField(int row, int col, Board.Mark mark)
      The method is used to set a mark on the board with a given row and column index
      Parameters:
      row - is index of row
      col - is index of column
      mark - is mark type to be set

    • setField

      public void setField(int index)
      This method uses setField(int row, int col, Mark mark), drawHorizontalLine and drawVerticalLine to draw a line and set that line on the board using a given index
      Parameters:
      index - is index of board

    • numSquares

      public int numSquares()
      This method returns the number of squares on the board which is used after a move is made to see if there is a difference between the number of squares before the move and number of squares after the move
      Returns:
      number of squares

    • getTotalSquares

      public int getTotalSquares()
      This method gives the value of the totalSquares field which is used to count the number of squares that were present before the move was made
      Returns:
      the total squares

    • changeSquares

      public void changeSquares(int i)
      This method is used to change the totalSquares field if the number of squares has increased after a move has been made
      Parameters:
      i - is the number of squares to be set

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if all the index positions have been filled and hence checks if the game is over
      Returns:
      if game is over
